page.title: 13TECHNOLOGY IN THE 80'S.
page.content: FARMPLAN. In our area is Farmplan.They employ 55 employees who are very interested in computers. The boss is a man called Paul Scudemore. Farmplan also have 3 other buisness' they work and help farms in agricultural programs. They also help a firm in buildings. Farmplan have 100 or more computers and they all are Apple's,Apricot's, IBM's and Kaypro's. Farmplan have many programs which include agricultural and they also have games and adventure programs. Farmplan's house (Mr. Scudemore's) was a derilict mansion but it has been modernised . BY { D. Cooke.
